## $translate() function

Translate an array of keys. The syntax of the strings is 'key<!-- -->@<!-- -->@<!-- -->\[default value\]'

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function $translate(keys: string[], params?: any, ctx?: SpeakState, lang?: string): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  keys | string\[\] | The array of keys to translate |
|  params | any | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional parameters contained in the values |
|  ctx | [SpeakState](./qwik-speak.speakstate.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional Speak context to be provided outside the component$ |
|  lang | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional language if different from the current one |

<b>Returns:</b>

string\[\]

The translations or the keys if not found
